direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods create unmodifiable versions of collections, one for a bag and one for a set.
Both methods wrap an existing object to make it unmodifiable, with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods handle serialization and deserialization, accessing similar resources (streams).
Both methods handle serialization and deserialization, accessing similar resources (streams).

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require initialization of a SortedBag object.
Setting up an unmodifiable collection is required before creating an unmodifiable SortedBag.
Both methods verify the unmodifiable state and handle similar exceptions (UnsupportedOperationException).
